skins.shipDescription: Akizuki-class destroyer number ten C Yoizuki.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Akizuki-class destroyer Yoizuki. I specialize in anti-air combat. If you ever have any problems, please tell me. I will solve them quickly for you.
skins.acquisition: I'm honored to meet you, Commander. I have come to assist you. From now on, I can help you with your work whenever needed.
skins.login: You have returned, Commander. I have already sorted all your documents.
skins.details: There is little I can do on my own. So, please, if I can assist in any way, don't be afraid to ask. I will help you.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Why I help people? I feel I should; therefore I do it... Is that strange?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Some have mistaken me for a light cruiser... I wonder why... I don't look like one...
skins.secretaryIdle3: "Forcing myself"? Not at all. If I were, my help would only have the opposite effect.
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you feel tired? Shall I give you a shoulder massage?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, are you asking for a beating?

skins.shipDescription: It's my turn? Hold on... Umm, could you please not stare at me like that? It's... making me feel uncomfortable.
skins.acquisition: It's my turn? Hold on... Umm, could you please not stare at me like that? It's... making me feel uncomfortable.
skins.login: I registered for several sporting events. I must give it my all so I won't slow down my teammates...
skins.details: I received a good luck charm from Harutsuki... It's nice when someone offers you their blessings.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Harutsuki, slow down and match your pace with mine... One, two! One two!
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's quite hot today, Commander. I brought a drink with me... I drank a little from it, but... would you like to have some?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ugh... My hair is being annoying... Harutsuki's not here, either... Excuse me, Commander, could you give me a hand?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I'm completely soaked in sweat... You probably shouldn't touch me.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Are you taking advantage of me at a time like this? Are you mentally prepared for what comes next, Commander?
